sentences.sContent: To bind into the service of another by indenture.
sentences.sContent_eng: To bind into the service of another by indenture.
sentences.sCn: 以契约约束按契约的规定为另一方服务。

remMethod.val: in + dent(牙齿) + ure(状态) → 原指古代师徒间分割成锯齿状的契约 → 以契约约束

words.tran: 犬牙交错的；受契约约束的；缩进排印的
缩进；切割成锯齿状（indent的过去分词）
以契约约束；签订契约（indenture的过去分词）

trans.tranOther: to enter into an agreement by indenture
a formal contract, especially in the past, between an apprentice and his master(= employer ), or the act of arranging this
